page.title: 18My family
page.content: My family are noisy.There is my{mum,} my{dad,}my{oldest brother}Kevin, my {second oldest}Steven, my{sister}Denise and then my{brother}Peter. Sometimes I play badminton with Steven. He always wins. I have a{grandad}but I haven't any {grandmas.}I have two{uncles.}One is a policeman. We always run to the river to play. The others go down the little weir but I just sit on top. There are lots of little fish. Peter and I go fishing with a fishing net.Sometimes there is a rope swing and I go on it.We went paddling once and I got stuck but my friend Sophie helped me. Kevin works and Steven is getting a job either at{Rolls Royce}or the {Railway.}He wants to get a job as an engineer.
